Description: IMPROVING SCHOOL BASED AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION AND YOUTH EXTESION PROGRAMS IN UGANDA.

Award Type: OTHER REIMBURSABLE, CONTINGENT, INTANGIBLE, OR INDIRECT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description: THE INTERNATIONAL AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM IN MEXICO COMPRISES RECRUITING, TRAINING THROUGH THREE PHASES , DEPLOYING, AND EVALUATING THE IMPACT OF NINE FELLOWS TO SERVE AS EDUCATORS OF SCHOOL BASED AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION METHODS CURRICULA, AND AS CHANGE AGENTS IN MEXICO. EACH FELLOW WILL BE DEPLOYED TO A COMMUNITY TO WORK IN A SCHOOL FOR THE MEXICAN SCHOOL YEAR. UNIVERSITY OF MISSOURI, THE RECIPIENT AND IMPLEMENTER, IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RECRUITING FELLOWS, CURRICULUM DEVELOPMENT, AND DEPLOYING SUPPORTING FELLOWS IN COUNTRY FURTHER DETAILED IN THE RECIPIENT RESPONSIBILITIES NOTE IN THE AGREEMENT . THE SUBRECIPIENT, UNIVERSIDAD POPULAR AUTONOMA DEL ESTADO DE PUEBLA WILL BE INSTRUMENTAL WITH ONGOING TRAINING SUPPORT ALONG WITH SOME ON THE GROUND COORDINATION.

Award Type: OTHER REIMBURSABLE, CONTINGENT, INTANGIBLE, OR INDIRECT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
Description: THE INTERNATIONAL AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM IN GHANA WILL INVOLVE RECRUITING, TRAINING THROUGH THREE PHASES , DEPLOYING, AND SUPPORTING NINE FELLOWS US CITIZENS AS THEY SERVE AS EDUCATORS OF POSITIVE YOUTH DEVELOPMENT AND SCHOOL-BASED AGRICULTURAL EDUCATION METHODS CURRICULA IN GHANA. EACH FELLOW WILL BE DEPLOYED TO WORK IN A SECONDARY SCHOOL AND SURROUNDING COMMUNITY FOR THE 2024 GHANAIAN SCHOOL YEAR. TEXAS A&M UNIVERSITY, THE RECIPIENT AND IMPLEMENTER, IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RECRUITING FELLOWS, CURRICULUM DEVELOPMENT, AND DEPLOYING SUPPORTING FELLOWS IN-COUNTRY (FURTHER DETAILED IN THE RECIPIENT RESPONSIBILITIES NOTE IN THE AGREEMENT . THE SUBRECIPIENT, VIVAYIC WILL BE INSTRUMENTAL WITH ONGOING TRAINING SUPPORT ALONG WITH SOME ON THE GROUND COORDINATION.

Award Type: OTHER REIMBURSABLE, CONTINGENT, INTANGIBLE, OR INDIRECT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE
